channel.title: CVE Feed for hardwaremaster -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hardwaremaster -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8543|2024-09-10T13:28:50.376Z -- hardwaremaster -- slider%20comparison%20image%20before%20and%20after
item.description: The Slider comparison image before and after plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's [sciba] shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 0.8.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-8543|2024-09-10T09:30:18.048Z -- hardwaremaster -- slider%20comparison%20image%20before%20and%20after
item.description: The Slider comparison image before and after plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's [sciba] shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 0.8.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
